scripts.host:installCertificate: yarn run test:sudo && sudo security add-trusted-cert -d -r trustRoot -k "/Library/Keychains/System.keychain" "./certs/ca.homestead.crt"
scripts.host:uninstallCertificate: sudo security find-certificate -c "Homestead homestead Root CA" -a -Z "/Library/Keychains/System.keychain" | sudo awk '/SHA-1/{system("security delete-certificate -Z "$NF)}'
scripts.install:certificate: yarn run test:sudo && yarn run vm:downloadCertificate && yarn run host:installCertificate && yarn run host:removeCertificate
scripts.install:newLinux: yarn run test:sudo && yarn install && composer install --profile --dev && yarn run install:hostUpdater && yarn run host:initRepoLinux && yarn run vm:init
scripts.install:newMac: yarn run test:sudo && yarn install && composer install --profile --dev && yarn run install:hostUpdater && yarn run host:initRepoMac && yarn run vm:init
scripts.install:newWindows: yarn run test:sudo && yarn install && composer install --profile --dev && yarn run install:hostUpdater && yarn run host:initRepoWindows && yarn run vm:init
scripts.uninstall:certificate: yarn run test:sudo && yarn run host:uninstallCertificate
scripts.vm:create: yarn run test:sudo && yarn run vm:start && yarn run install:certificate
scripts.vm:destroy: yarn run test:sudo && vagrant destroy --force && yarn run host:uninstallCertificate
scripts.vm:recreate: yarn run vm:destroy && yarn run vm:create
